titleStmt.title: The Night-walker of Bloomsbury being the result of several late consultations between a vintner, Judge Tallow-Chandler, a brace of fishmongers, and a printer, &c. : in a dialogue between Ralph and Will.
titleStmt.author: Nieuhof, Johannes, 1618-1672.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Johan Nieuhof by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
